about_the_game:
VRTGO is the premiere destination for immersive 360º/VR music videos, live performances and musical experiences. Don’t just listen to music: experience it!

VRTGO is a truly immersive and creative platform for artists to tell their stories and invite their fans around the world to experience 360º/VR live performances and music videos like never before.

Features:

360 music videos from the world’s greatest artists
Interactive VR music experiences
360 VR performances and concerts streamed live!
Ambisonic sound lets you experience the music in an entirely new way
360º stereoscopic videos immerses you in mind-bending VR

Powered by Universal Music Group & VRLIVE

name: VRTGO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: VRTGO is a truly immersive and creative platform for artists to tell their stories and invite their fans around the world to experience live performances and music videos like never before.
